title: Guru Nanak’s life teaches world to live with peace and prosperity. Khalil George
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 22 (APP):Caretaker Federal Minister for Human Rights, Khalil George on Friday said that Guru Nanak’s taught the world to live with peace for prosperous world.
The minister expressed the views during his visit to shrine of Guru Nanak Devji.
There was an urgent need to create relationships of mutual respect and love among all communities, he added.
The minister urged the political leaders to pay attention to the message of peace, adding “We need leaders who can become role models for the youth.”
